member.name: WINHTTP_REQUEST_TIMES
member.summary: The WINHTTP_REQUEST_TIMES structure contains a variety of timing information for a request.

member.name: WINHTTP_REQUEST_TIMES.cTimes
member.summary: Unsigned long integer value that contains the number of timings to retrieve. This should generally be set to WinHttpRequestTimeLast.

summary.para: Array of unsigned long long integer values that will contain the returned timings, indexed by .
Times are measured as performance counter values; for more information, see .
